;
;Chamberlain GmbH serving the area around Saarwellingen, Germany is some sort of principal supplier of commercial garage door openers, commercial and residential gate managers, and remote controls in the world. The company has offices in France, England, holland, Poland, Slovak Republic together with Singapore. Chamberlain products are available almost across the whole world.
;
;Chamberlain offers garage door openers in commercial together with residential varieties. Chamberlain®, Whisper Drive® and Power Drive® Garage Door Openers are the most used brands from Chamberlain.
;
;LiftMaster® is the most popular brand from Chamberlain. That range also includes this Liftmaster garage door opener remotes, substitute parts, mini transmitters, keychain remotes and other accessories. LiftMaster garage door openers can be purchased in different drive and horsepower modes and tend to be combined with a wide array of accessories and options. Your LiftMaster range contains: the Estate Series, the Premium series and also the Contractor series. These are available in the belt drive; screw drive together with in chain drive designs.
;
;Chamberlain's Power Drive® and Whisper Drive® belong to the residential garage door opener category inside do-it-yourself range. The Elite(TM) range contains premier residential and commercial gate operators together with access control systems. The Sentex® range is for secure residential and commercial garages.
;
;Sears Holdings Corporation, parent of Kmart together with Sears, Roebuck and Company., is the third largest broad line retailer the united states. Sears Holdings is a respected supplier of tools, lawn and garden, home consumer electronics, and automotive repair and maintenance. It supplies the Craftsman selection of garage door openers.
;
;Craftsman materials power tools, storage chests and cabinets, bench power tools, mechanics tools, power tool accessories, general hand equipment, compressor tools, carpentry tools and home security and garage door openers and accessories. The Craftsman selection of garage door openers consist of simple ½ hp car port door opener, ¾ h . p . garage door opener with chain drive models. Other products are the universal remote control the conversion process kit with 1 remote, the 10ft chain get extension kit, the 10ft proxy kit for garage entry opener, the 8ft expansion kit for garage entry opener, the 8ft rail extension kit, the Handheld remote control, 3-function security, keyless entry pad, plug-in light control for garage door opener, the wireless garage door monitor and also the extension kit (bolt drive).
;
;David Dalton, established in 1954, is the producer and supplier of the safest residential and commercial garage doors and garage door openers in the us. Wayne Dalton supplies two kinds of garage door openers: wall mount and ceiling mount. The wall mount openers, a special product from Wayne Dalton, can be mounted on the wall next to the door. Amazingly, doors that operate on hinges can simply be tailored to electric powered operation. This is because there is quite small bodyweight to have during the motorized transition. The only predicament exactly where this is not the case is in large winds.
